a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average learning outcomes vs. government expenditure per primary student, 2020
Average learning outcomes correspond to test scores across standardized, psychometrically-robust international and
Initial government funding per primary student
Data source: Angrist et al. (2019); World Bank EdStats (2019)
Note: Government funding data is expressed in international-$ at 2019 prices.
